name: Till Death Do Us Heart
description:
A point and click mystery adventure game made for the Godot Wild Jam 30.

Friday 14th February, 8:05pm.
You’ve just had surgery to mend your broken heart. And you're being discharged! But there's something you should know: During the operation, your heart was... misplaced. Luckily, it was replaced with a perfectly good artichoke heart! You'll never know the difference. Except it can't handle excitement. Find your stolen heart.
Keep your heartbeat below 200, otherwise, well, terrible things.
Please play in full screen. For the best experience, play the downloadable version! Please note, the HTML version may take a little while to load.

Theme: Heartbeat
Wildcards: Flattery, Arcade.

Made by:
SarahSsss7#9089,
Sophiablabla#7563
hnuqweasd#3731
